participant_1.background:
I've had to say goodbye to my cat, who was my best friend.
I had to learn to adapt to a new way of life after my farm was foreclosed.
I enjoy a good debate with myself on my free time, perhaps over a glass of expensive wine.
I usually spend my free time helping people in need.
I spent the year creating a series of paintings inspired by my favorite childhood books.

participant_2.background:
I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.
I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.
i like to create websites.
I do my best to support my family and be there for them.
my major was american literature and education.

content.text: Pretty well, thanks. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to create websites and spend time with my family.
Oh nice! I am an artist and love to create paintings. I also like to spend time with my family.
I used to love to paint when I was younger, but haven't had time in recent years.
I got my degree in American Literature and Education, and have been very busy working and raising my family.
Oh, I see. That is very understandable.
Yes, it has been a lot of work, but I am happy with where I am at in life.
Good! I am glad to hear that.
Thank you! What is your favorite childhood book?
I really enjoyed reading the Little House on the Prairie series as a child.
Oh, that is a classic! I have read those books as well.
Yes, they are very good! I also enjoyed reading the Nancy Drew series.
I loved Nancy Drew books too! I must have read every single one of them.
Me too! They were so much fun to read.
Yes, they were. Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I love to volunteer my time to help people in need
